title: How To Catch A Billionaire
description: Sarah Smith is a recent college grad with dreams to be a big time actress. The only problem is, she can't find an acting job anywhere. So she decides to accept a job at Zoom Corp and uses her acting position to get an executive position.Sarah thinks she has hit the big time until she meets CEO Harry Green, the only problem is she doesn't realize he is the CEO and makes a fool of herself. It's not long before she's out of a job and into Harry's bed. Before long Sarah finds herself falling in love but Harry lets her know in no uncertain terms that he doesn't play for keeps. So Sarah decides to see if she can figure out how to catch a billionaire with the help of her best friend Jane.
author: Helen    Cooper
